text: What's up Foodtubers? Yes! I am here cooking with Poo, with Poo herself all the way from Thailand.
We are going to do some proper Thai cooking from the experts.
Spicy, sour, sweet.
C'mon get those guns going.
Poo, I love you.
Well... Yummie.
Poo, this is a lovely opportunity to get to know you a little bit -
- and where you come from.
So, tell us about where you come from.
I'm from Thailand, I come from Bangkok.
From Bangkok -
- and, how did you get here? How did you get to England, how did you get to be on Foodtube -
- what's your journey on cooking been?
About 14 years ago, I served the food in front of my home, have the small chop -
- every day, is hard work.
Till I will for one day, 5 o'clock till 9:00 pm, the money not enough -
- I finished, 100 people in the slum buy the food from me cooking - everyone so sad.
But I so sad too.
This is the slum where you come from, isn't it?
Yep.
What's the name of this place?
The Klong Toey slum.
And I've heard that there is nearly a 100.000 people live ...
Yeah, live in the Klong Toey slum.
Which is like a mile big...
Now, you have a cooking school now ...
Yeah, I have cooking school.
The cooking school and helping hand, changed my life and changed a lot of people in the slum too.
You're all about giving back opportunities to people in the slum -
- and trying to make the slum, you know, have positivity and growth and opportunity ...
Yeah like now.
If you go to cookingwithpoo.com?
Yeah, cookingwithpoo.com
You can see her book and her website and stuff.
So, some of the money of this book goes to incentivising people in the slum.
When I look through the book guys, and I see a lot of cook books, this is a beautify book.
Poo actually hasn't a robust publisher in the UK yet, but there is a lady that has a couple of 100 ...
... that will send them out to you.
So if you go to cookingwithpoo.com you can pay for it there, and she'll send it to you.
What I love about this book, is that it is really what people from outside of Asia need.
We need like...  this is kinda like all the best recipes that you really need in your life.
Well, Poo, it's been lovely to meet you, thank you for coming ...
... to Essex, thank you for doing the foodtube videos.
Guys if you want to see more Poo, then click on the details below, you're going to love it, love it.
Get some of this beautiful food into your life.
Take care. Bye!
Thank you!
